name: python-skill-builder
description: Interactive Python training application with sandboxed code execution and automated grading

scripts.test: command -v pytest >/dev/null 2>&1 && pytest || echo '⏭️  Skipping Python tests (pytest not available)'
scripts.pretest: command -v python >/dev/null 2>&1 && npm run validate:coverage || echo '⏭️  Skipping coverage validation (python not available)'
scripts.precommit: npm run validate:coverage && npm run lint
scripts.ci: npm run validate:coverage && npm run test:coverage && npm run lint

author: BPM Software Solutions
